me pilibanda janadhipathiwaraya danuwath karana bawa da pawasiya.me udghoshanayata shri lanka nidahas sewaka sangamaya samanga jathika sewaka sangamaye sewakayan da ekwa atha.eeye (10) perawaru 10.10 ta yedunu suba mohothin aayathana pawarime giwisuma athsan kirimata niyamithawa thibu bawa shri lanka nidahas sewaka sangamaye sinor aayathanaye sabhapathi sunil rajapaksha mahatha pawasiya..

mema kalpithaya nawatha salakillata bhajanaya wuye 1786 di shrimath wiliyam jons palamu wathawata ee wana wita dana thibu aakarayata thibu puranathama bhashawan wu lathin, grika, sanskrutha, ha ohu thawakalika washayen gothik, keltik, parsiyanu yana bhashawala thibu samanakam pilibanda deshana pawathwima samanga yi.
